name: Cascading fog
description:
You are castaway on an island covered with mysterious layer of thick fog which makes navigation very difficult, luckily you have a bit of help from a previous stranded survivor who's priority was to escape this so called cursed island.

Use the waterfalls to hide from any possible threat!

Controls:

W,A,S,D - movement

Right Mouse Button - Map

X - Fill/Drink from canteen

E - Interact

ESC - Back to the menu (you'll have to start over!)
